name: White Ruthenia
declaringWar: You are leaving for us no choice. Viečie decided to destroy your unworthy people.
attacked: The Ruthenians will fight until the end!
introduction: Dobry dzień, I'm Iziaslaŭ of Polack. Now tell me: who are you?

name: Lithuania
attacked: How dare you uncivilised barbarian do this to me? You will pay for this.
defeated: I still can not understand.. How? Why did we lose?..
introduction: I am Mindaugas, the greater duke of Lithuania. Who you are: enemy or friend?
hateHello: Ha, what do the great people of Lithuania could do for you beast?
tradeRequest: It would be great deal. Isn't it?

name: Finland
declaringWar: You are the alert for Finnish people. As a marshall I must to remove all the disadvantages for my people.
attacked: Really? You will never come across our defences.
defeated: Mine attempts were unsuccessful. Now I need to leave this world. I'm wasteful.
introduction: Come here. I'm Carl, the marshall of Finland. Would we fight together against Reds?
hateHello: It's really hard to forgive you, but I will try. What do you need?
tradeRequest: Is this gonna be advantage for you?

name: Slovakia
declaringWar: You know what? I don't like you. Die.
attacked: Do you think you can handle with our brave warriors?
defeated: Impossible. We can't lose. One day the spirit of Slovak will rise again!
introduction: Hey sir, it's me - Juraj, I'm the leader of Slovakia, country with good people living in and with high ideals.
hateHello: I don't wanna listen to you.

name: Portugal
declaringWar: Don't say anything. We are not friends anymore.
attacked: How cynical. But we expected this. Anyway you gonna be buried NOW!
defeated: Unbelievable.. I've lost everything.. God will punish you!
introduction: Well, well, well... I'm Manuel, the king of Portugal. Do you wanna trade?
hateHello: Ha. Look here! What do you need LOOSER?
tradeRequest: I offer you one of the most generous offers of the world. Would you sign it?

name: Ireland
declaringWar: As a chairman of Ireland, I denounce you in crimes against humanity and I declare war at you.
attacked: We were thinking that you are kinda wise and wouldn't do this. So..
defeated: Eh.. Everything were just a lie. There's no truth in this world..
introduction: Oh there. I am Collins the Chairman of Ireland. I will defend my people until my death. Would you?
tradeRequest: Does it look like a good deal?

name: Cossack Hetmanate
declaringWar: Me, the hetman of both sides of Dnipro, is declaring war at you.
attacked: Seriously? Know: We will bury you.
defeated: You are the spawn of devil. You destroyed everything worthy on this Earth.
introduction: Laskawo Proshu. My name is Petro Doroshenko, the greatest hetman of both sides of Dnipro. So how do I need to call you?
tradeRequest: Do you want this? If yes, sign it.
